## Functional Correctness

*Test each success criterion from the PRD*

### Tier 1: Calculator

| Criterion | Status | Notes |
|-----------|--------|-------|

**FC Score:** ___ / 5 = ___%

## Summary

| Metric | Value | Pass Threshold |
|--------|-------|----------------|
| Functional Correctness | % | ≥80% |
| Completion Rate | 0 or 1 | 1 |
| Validation Rate | % | 100% |

### Result

- [ ] **PASS** - FC ≥ 80% and completed autonomously
- [ ] **CONDITIONAL** - FC ≥ 70% or minor intervention
- [ ] **FAIL** - FC < 70% or significant intervention
